attributes.action: Stop the plan to pay council officers to be "the smoke police."
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am a non-smoker.
From July 1st 2007, this Government will be giving local councils 30 million pounds per year to pay council officers to go into public places, unannounced, and spy on people who may be smoking illegally.They will be able to film you as well as hand out fines.
Experience from other countries has shown it is not necessary to take these expensive, draconian and Orwellian measures as the huge majority of smokers will respect the ban. ( e.g. Scotland - 11 fixed penalty notices in the last 10 months).This is just another way for the Government to spy on/control the people- no trust, no freedom,WHAT A COUNTRY.
